title: AutoTrain SFT Training Task
name: autotrain-sft-task
setup: uv pip install "numpy<2" --upgrade; uv pip install autotrain-advanced; uv pip install bitsandbytes==0.45.5 transformerlab wandb
description: SFT training task using Hugging Face AutoTrain. Requires a Hugging Face token in HF_TOKEN env var for model access.
